goal.ch:
修習完本課程，學生能夠： 
1. 辨識各種口說/簡報技巧及自己口語表達的優劣勢 2. 選取參考資料並組織成恰當的簡報內容 
3. 應用各種口說/簡報技巧實際演練 
4. 提高口說/簡報的流暢度、正確度、與專業度
goal.en:
Upon completion of this course, students will be able to:
Identify various oral presentation skills and assess their own strengths and weaknesses in verbal expression.
Select reference materials and organize them into appropriate presentation content.
Apply various oral presentation skills through practical exercises.
Improve the fluency, accuracy, and professionalism of their oral presentations.
